content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, it's a pleasure to meet you. I agree to rent my apartment to you for a monthly price of 800 Euros. This includes all utilities and other necessary expenses.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros. Thank you. [

I have a question. Can you give me a lease agreement?

What is the rent payment due date and how can I make the payments?

What is the deposit amount and when will it be returned?

What is the policy on pets?

Can I have a roommate?

What is the policy on noise levels?

What is the policy on smoking and drugs?

Can I have a party in the apartment?

What is the policy on late payments?

Is there a parking space included?

Can I have a balcony?

What is the policy on garbage disposal?

What is the policy on cleaning and maintenance?

Is there a laundry room nearby?

What is the policy on electricity and gas usage?

What is the policy on water usage?

What is the policy on internet and cable TV?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Certainly, Aziz. Here is the lease agreement for your apartment. The rent payment is due on the 1st day of every month and you can make payments through a bank transfer or in person at my office. The deposit amount is 200 Euros and it will be returned to you upon the end of the lease agreement, provided that you have fulfilled all your obligations.

Pets are not allowed in the apartment. You are not allowed to have a roommate without my prior approval. The noise level in the apartment should be kept to a minimum, and smoking and drugs are strictly prohibited. You are not allowed to have parties in the apartment. Late payments will result in a penalty fee.

There is no parking space included, but there are several public parking options nearby. You can have a balcony, but you are responsible for maintaining it. Garbage disposal is the responsibility of the tenant. Cleaning and maintenance of the apartment are also the responsibility of the tenant. There is a laundry room nearby, and you can use electricity and gas in the apartment, but water usage is limited. Internet and cable TV are available, but you will need to subscribe for them separately.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for the information. I am very happy with the apartment and the rental price. I agree to the lease agreement and the terms and conditions.

I will make the first payment on the 1st of next month. I will make the rest of the payments on the 1st of every month.

I will contact you if I have any questions or concerns in the future.

Thank you again for your help.

Sincerely,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you, Aziz. I'm glad you're happy with the apartment and the rental price. I look forward to hearing from you in the future.
name: Heinrich Heine
